## canvasToImage() function

canvasè½¬image This function converts a canvas element to an image element in TypeScript.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function canvasToImage(cvs: HTMLCanvasElement): HTMLImageElement;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  cvs | HTMLCanvasElement | HTMLCanvasElement - This is a reference to an HTML canvas element that contains the image data that we want to convert to an image. |
